Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 35-4510.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-235, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 31-3401.

For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-274, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 31-3401.

Miscellaneous Notes

Application of Law 12-274: Section 501(b) of D.C. Law 12-274 provided that this section shall apply upon the promulgation of regulations pursuant to § 32- 574.1 [§ 44-304.01, 2001 Ed.].
